title: What is the best review platform for enterprise technology reviews and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are several review platforms out there, I personally manage our company’s profile on CrowdReviews, trustradius, Capterra, and G2Crowd (we have an enterprise-ready iPaaS solution). But when I need to check some enterprise solution or tool myself, I prefer using G2Crowd to all others. First, I believe G2Crowd is the most extensive platform, it has an unbelievable amount of products, solutions and tools. Capterra is the second on the line, the rest cannot compete (yet) at all. Secondly, I have the impression that G2Crowd has more reviews than any other platform. Sometimes, I check several platforms to get the full picture about a tool or solution, and while G2Crowd offers, let’s say, 15 reviews, Capterra would offer only 3, and the rest won’t have any reviews at all. Thirdly, G2Crowd offers the best interface, in my opinion. But really, the second point is the most important. After all, the whole purpose of a review platform is that it offers lots of reviews. (Disclaimer - I work with elastic.io | Integration Platform as a Service and have, therefore, no personal interest with respect to the parties involved)

The sites that Olga mentioned are all good options, but if you want in-depth reviews by real enterprise technology users, I highly recommend that you take a look at IT Central Station. We have nearly 200,000 peer-to-peer reviews with in-depth content. (Disclaimer: I work at IT Central Station, the “Yelp” for enterprise tech reviews)
